    • Method Detail

      • parseSudokuFile

        public static Grid parseSudokuFile(java.io.File f)
                            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method will parse a plain text file containing a 9x9 comma-separated representation of a Sudoku grid as a Grid object. This perfoms checking throughout the parsing process to ensure the format of the file is valid. Note that the validity of the puzzle (e.g., whether the arrangement of values on the grid meet the Sudoku constraints) is not checked.
        Parameters:
        f - A file containing the Sudoku grid.
        Returns:
        The parsed Sudoku grid.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown by Scanner if file cannot be found.

      • writeSudokuFile

        public static void writeSudokuFile(Grid grid,
                                   java.io.File f)
                            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        This will write a grid to file in the 9x9 comma separated format.
        Parameters:
        grid - Grid to be written.
        f - The file to write the grid to.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Problem initialising output file.
        java.io.IOException - Problem while writing to file.
